claim: George A. Romero directed The Crazies.
premise_source_doc_sentence: George Andrew Romero  (  -LSB- rə 'm ɛroʊ -RSB- born February 4 , 1940  )  is an American-Canadian filmmaker and editor , best known for his series of gruesome and satirical horror films about an imagined zombie apocalypse , beginning with Night of the Living Dead and notably continuing on with Dawn of the Dead and Day of the Dead .

claim: George A. Romero directed The Crazies.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His other works contributed include The Crazies , Creepshow , Martin , Monkey Shines , and The Dark Half .

claim: George A. Romero directed The Crazies.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Crazies is a 2010 American science fiction horror film directed by Breck Eisner , with a screenplay by Scott Kosar and Ray Wright .

claim: George A. Romero directed The Crazies.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is a remake of the 1973 film of the same name by George A. Romero , who is an executive producer of the remake .

premise_source_doc_sentence: Throughout the game , the Crazies jump up and down when the opposing team has possession of the ball and yell cheers in unison at focal points of the game .
